name: adv_level_max
displayName: Highest level BEAT in adventure mode (negative levels indicate the boss level for that zone, so -10 means beat boss 1, -60 means beat ANY boss 6 incarnation)

name: heroic_level_max
displayName: Highest level BEAT in heroic mode (see adv mode comments regarding bosses)

name: if_level_max
displayName: Highest level BEAT in iron frog mode

name: num_challenge_starts
displayName: Number of times user started a challenge mode game

name: num_challenge_losses
displayName: Number of times user lost a challenge level (did not meet challenge score target)

name: num_challenge_wins
displayName: Number of times user met or exceeded the challenge score target
